# Change: 'dropIndex'

Drops an existing index

## Available Attributes ##

<table class='attribs'>
<tr><th>Name</th><th>Description</th></tr>
<tr><td class="name">catalogName</td><td class="desc">Name of the catalog<span class="right"><span class="since">@ v3.0</span><span class="sample">E.g. <span class="val">&#x27;cat&#x27;</span></span></span></td></tr>
<tr><td class="name" required>indexName</td><td class="desc">Name of the index to drop<span class="right"><span class="sample">E.g. <span class="val">&#x27;idx_address&#x27;</span></span></span></td></tr>
<tr><td class="name">schemaName</td><td class="desc">Name of the schema<span class="right"><span class="sample">E.g. <span class="val">&#x27;public&#x27;</span></span></span></td></tr>
<tr><td class="name">tableName</td><td class="desc">Name of the indexed table.<span class="right"><span class="sample">E.g. <span class="val">&#x27;person&#x27;</span></span></span><span class="right"><b>Required for: </b>asany, mariadb, mssql, mysql, sybase</span></td></tr>
</table>

<ul>
    <li><a href="#tab-xml">XML Sample</a></li>
    <li><a href="#tab-yaml">YAML Sample</a></li>

<div id='tab-xml'>
{% highlight xml %}
<changeSet author="liquibase-docs" id="dropIndex-example">
    <dropIndex catalogName="cat"
            indexName="idx_address"
            schemaName="public"
            tableName="person"/>
</changeSet>
{% endhighlight %}
</div>
<div id='tab-yaml'>
{% highlight yaml %}
changeSet:
  id: dropIndex-example
  author: liquibase-docs
  changes:
  - dropIndex:
      catalogName: cat
      indexName: idx_address
      schemaName: public
      tableName: person

{% endhighlight %}
</div>

{

    "changes": [
      {
        "dropIndex": {
          "catalogName": "cat",
          "indexName": "idx_address",
          "schemaName": "public",
          "tableName": "person"
        }
      }]

{% endhighlight %}

## SQL Generated From Above Sample (MySQL)

{% highlight sql %}
DROP INDEX idx_address ON cat.person;


{% endhighlight %}
